com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Class DatabaseCopyOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.DatabaseCopyOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, DatabaseCopyOperations

    public class DatabaseCopyOperationsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, DatabaseCopyOperations
    Represents the SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing SQL Server database copies for a subscription.
